TRAPT package
=============

November 15, 2024

**Title** TRAPT: A multi-stage fused deep learning framework for transcriptional 
regulators prediction via integrating large-scale epigenomic data

**Maintainer** Guorui Zhang <mp798378522@gmail.com>

**Description** TRAPT is a multi-omics integration framework designed 
for inferring transcriptional regulator activity from a set of query genes. 
TRAPT employs a multi-stage fusion strategy to address the issues 
of incomplete cis-regulatory profile coverage and TRBP problems. 
By leveraging two-stage self-knowledge distillation to extract the activity 
embedding of regulatory elements, TRAPT can predicts key regulatory 
factors for sets of query genes through a fusion strategy.
